H0.text: Which 590 mile long river rises on France's 'Langres Plateau', enters Belgium at Givet, then flows across that country to Holland and thence to the North Sea. Rhine

H3.text: Which 590 mile long river rises on France's 'Langres Plateau', enters Belgium at Givet, then flows across that country to Holland and thence to the North Sea. MEUSE

A4.text: The Meuse rises in Pouilly-en-Bassigny, commune of Le Ch√¢telet-sur-Meuse on the Langres plateau in France

A5.text: The Meuse is a major European river, rising in France and flowing through Belgium and the Netherlands before draining into the North Sea
